name: Altidudes (itch)
description:
Hearkening back to the good ol' days of joy and wonderment in your local arcade/pizzeria, Altidudes promises to deliver a genuine experience just like you remember!  

Features:

- Use a single button for all input and gameplay

- Jump, dodge, and slide your way up an impossibly tall mountain

- Beat your high score again and again!

- Unlock and choose from a variety of dudes to play as!

- Beautiful art created pixel by pixel and inspired by your favorite arcade games of yesteryear

- Fanastic 8-bit tunes by Bert Cole that will keep you coming back for more!

Thanks for checking it out dudes and dudettes!

By clicking the button to purchase, you agree to the terms set forth in the Altidudes EULA: https://www.ridentem.com/altidudes-eula
